p:
As for R CT, the Si@PAA- g-PEG electrode revealed a lower resistance value than Si@PAA due to the enhanced lithium ion conductivity provided by the PEG domain. R CT is influenced by both electronic and ionic resistance, since charge transfer involves the transfer of both electrons and lithium ions, and the electrode made of the binder (PAA- g-PEG), which had poor mechanical properties, lost electronic and ionic contact after cycling, leading to an increase in R CT
38, 59 .
